Waffles

Ingredients

Amount Ingredient
2 cups All-Purpose Flour
2 tbsp Sugar
2 tsp Baking Powder
1 tsp Baking Soda
1⁄2 tsp Salt
2 cups Low-Fat Buttermilk
1⁄2 cup Unsalted Butter, Melted
2 ea Large Eggs
